summary: Adds several Adventure Time themed weapons into Skyrim.  All craftable with the Steel Smithing Perk.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][YOUTUBE]V0YPpWCAzII[/YOUTUBE][/CENTER]


[center]What time is it? Time to stop asking that question!!![/center]


Originally intended to be individual sets of weapons for each character, I decided to release them all in one mod to make it easier for everyone.

Older version has been deleted and is no longer being supported. This mod may cause conflicts with outdated version.

All weapons are craftable at any forge. Weapons can be tempered at any grindstone.

=============================
Weapons included as of 7/08/14
=============================

(Steel Smithing Perk is required to craft all weapons)

Marceline's Axe Bass (2-handed)
Finn's Root Sword (1-handed and 2-handed)
Fionna's Crystal Sword (1-handed and 2-handed)
Scarlet (1-handed and 2-handed)
Demon Blood Sword (1-handed and 2-handed)

=======
Credits
=======

Pendleton Ward for creating Adventure Time.
author: Durai
